name: Feudalkeen Death Commando
description:
ARROWS - Move/Rotate/"dpad"

X - Attack/"a button"

SPACE - Switch Weapon/"b button"

ESC - Back/"Exit"

The desert is crawling with dangerous creatures. Use the right weapon for the job. Watch out, ammo is scarce.

Created for the third lost cartridge jam 2021.

Thanks for playing! Feel free to drop me a comment.
